data.message: Add schema-resilient status lookup to promotion feeder: Added _decision_status() helper that checks 5 possible schema paths: d.status, data.status, data.validation.status, data.outcome.status, data.outcome.validation_status. Changed transition check to use post_status from actual decision object instead of trusting arguments. Now correctly prevents double-counting regardless of schema variations.
data.task: Add schema-resilient status lookup to promotion feeder
data.outcome: Added _decision_status() helper that checks 5 possible schema paths: d.status, data.status, data.validation.status, data.outcome.status, data.outcome.validation_status. Changed transition check to use post_status from actual decision object instead of trusting arguments. Now correctly prevents double-counting regardless of schema variations.
